pos: Ichidan verb - zuru verb (alternative form of -jiru verbs)
Ichidan verb - zuru verb (alternative form of -jiru verbs)
Ichidan verb - zuru verb (alternative form of -jiru verbs)
meanings: to pretend (e.g. to be a good father)

related.meaning: untuk tampil, untuk memainkan (suatu peran), untuk berakting

lessons.japanese: 彼はロミオを演ずるとプログラムに出ていた。
lessons.indonesian: It says in the program that he's playing Romeo.

lessons.japanese: 日本は国際社会でますます大きな役割を演ずる事が予想される。
lessons.indonesian: Japan is expected to play a greater role in international society.

lessons.japanese: 世論は政治の領域で重要な役割を演ずる。
lessons.indonesian: Public opinion plays a vital role in politics.

lessons.japanese: 世論は政治の領域で重要な役割を演ずる。
lessons.indonesian: Public opinion plays a vital role in politics.

lessons.japanese: 日本は国際社会でますます大きな役割を演ずる事が予想される。
lessons.indonesian: Japan is expected to play a greater role in international society.

lessons.japanese: 彼はロミオを演ずるとポスターに出ていた。
lessons.indonesian: He was billed to appear as Romeo.

lessons.japanese: 彼はロミオを演ずるとポスターに出ていた。
lessons.indonesian: He was billed to appear as Romeo.

lessons.japanese: 彼はロミオを演ずるとプログラムに出ていた。
